programme.title: A Taxi Driver
programme.desc: A widowed father and taxi driver takes a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Worst Woman
programme.desc: Eun-hee is an actress with poor acting and she acts in her life. She creates different characters when she dates a man. Eventually, her lies are tangled up and everything is messed up...

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left behind to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Firefighters
programme.desc: Based on the Hongje-dong fire accident in 2001, the movie depicts the harsh conditions that firefighters face every day as if it were their last mission to save lives and survive.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left behind to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Firefighters
programme.desc: Based on the Hongje-dong fire accident in 2001, the movie depicts the harsh conditions that firefighters face every day as if it were their last mission to save lives and survive.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: Miss Granny

programme.desc: A blind date program which adapts to the modern life's pace to provide a platform for single boys and girls to find the person who they liked. After his uncle Su Jingxuan frames Yi Ning and seizes her business, Shen helps expose Sus crimes, restoring justice and renewing their relationship built on trust.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep80
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! programme.title: Just Eat (M) Ep36
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2356
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5113
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai becomes the prime suspect in a police murder case. He takes hostages at the police station and demands to negotiate with former negotiator Jun. As the two engage in a high-stake battle of wits, their expertise in psychological manipulation leads to a tense verbal sparring match, gradually shifting their positions and mind sets.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai becomes the prime suspect in a police murder case. He takes hostages at the police station and demands to negotiate with former negotiator Jun. As the two engage in a high-stake battle of wits, their expertise in psychological manipulation leads to a tense verbal sparring match, gradually shifting their positions and mind sets.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon Thundering Sword to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: A young guy Wu, heads off to the Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend Lian Chu, who was promised to be his bride. When he arrives, he finds out that the family of his bride may not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: When he is dropped off at the home of Ray Gleeson (Ted Danson), the father he hasnt seen in years, Timmy (Macaulay Culkin) hopes that theyll be able to spend some time together. But, unfortunately, Dad and his two klutzy cohorts are too busy with a get-rich-quick scheme, illegally paving the road to financial bliss...that is, until Timmy steps into their path. Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: The next installment in the Mission Impossible franchise. Super-spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) has retired from active duty to train new IMF agents. But he is called back into action to confront the toughest villain he's ever faced - Owen Davian (Philip Seymour Hoffman), an international weapons and information provider with no remorse and no conscience. Hunt assembles his team - his old friend Luther Strickell (Ving Rhames), transportation expert Declan (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), background operative Zhen (Maggie Q), and fresh recruit Lindsey (Keri Russell) - to travel the globe pursuing Davian and rescue Hunt's love, Julia (Michelle Monaghan).

programme.desc: Michael and Natalie Sharpe have 5 kids, and mysterious gut problems. They tell Michael their healthy shop contains salads, veggies and healthy proteins. But when Michael ambushes them at the checkout - their trolley tells another story.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Tastes of the Tea Trade - Starting in the busy container port and tea centre of Dubai, a tea hub where millions of tonnes of tea are traded from east to west, we move in Fujian Province to witness the beautiful natural withering process of White Tea, increasing in popularity in China and around the world.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Oceans - There are not five separate oceans, but one. Its waters are linked by powerful forces that keep them on the move. This constant mixing is vital for the health of oceans and marine life.

programme.title: Michael Mosley: Secrets Of Your Big Shop S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Michael is undercover takeaway delivery man, who shocks Liam and Lydia Rooney with their massive weekly takeaway consumption, which is ruining their health and finances.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Long Weekends S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Stockholm, Part 1 - Michael starts his time in Stockholm by braving the frozen waters of the Baltic Sea.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 1 - See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Michael Mosley: Secrets Of Your Big Shop S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Michael is undercover takeaway delivery man, who shocks Liam and Lydia Rooney with their massive weekly takeaway consumption, which is ruining their health and finances.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fight Club - Step into the ring with natures top brawlers, who use violence to get what they need. Watch the cannibalistic Portia spider devour the competition, uncover the bloodthirsty side of cuddly koalas, and catch an epic neck-whipping giraffe battle.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Gangsters - Get inside the toughest gangs that roam the Earth and see what true grit looks like in the wild. Chase a band of marauding locusts, watch the coconut octopus ambush its next meal, and meet a flock of finches whove developed a taste for blood.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Clean Up Crew - Winter in Marakele National Park is one of the scarcest, but also most plentiful, times of the year. See how a giraffes demise becomes a source of life for the regions vultures, whose survival depends on the decaying flesh of animals like these.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Fantastic Frogs - Cape Town, South Africa is home to twenty types of frogs, but many are threatened by urban development. Meet a variety of the regions species as we follow western leopard toads on their tenuous journey to breed in the citys shrinking wetlands.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant Story - Once superabundant, African Elephant populations have declined drastically due to hunting. Get an in-depth look into the lives of the most powerful land mammals on the planet, and see what parks like Addo and Tembe are doing to preserve their future.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Killer Packs - Surviving the African savanna requires guile and teamwork for species who live in packs. Follow a day in the life of African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses to see how they rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenging landscape.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Living Together - A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in natures great scheme. Complex interactions between species are not even limited to animals, and some of the best examples occur in the lush mountain forests of Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo - The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africas amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Nature Scenes S1 Ep43
programme.desc: African Animals Part 2 - One hour of uninterrupted African animals. Watch African elephants, black rhinos and hippos eat, play and rest.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Living Together - A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Touch - The sense of touch is useful to feel physical forces such as bites, changes in temperature and texture. Some animals have become extra sensitive to very faint vibrations, which gives them a lot of information about their environment.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lankas lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but dont be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to the Tundra - Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wines New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Eriks head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mias life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains - Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sight - Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moths clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves hes much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands - The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jamie whips up super-speedy smashed lemongrass chicken, flavour-packed sweet potato chilli with homemade nachos, and a chocolate party tray cake with tinned mandarins and buttercream.

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Starting from Scratch - Mary meets Anton Du Beke in sunny Bournemouth to teach him simple recipes, perfect for a total beginner, squeezing in time for a waltz along the pier and trip on the Ferris wheel.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep9
programme.desc: Weston-super-Mare - George meets DIY renovators Simon and Holly who are transforming a dilapidated Georgian-style crescent house, that was divided into four flats, with a 40,000 budget and no building experience.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep3
programme.desc: Pioneers - Kevin and the experts explore the pioneering homes, from a suburban, mock-Tudor industrial chic fusion and a groundbreaking eco-extended historic cottage, to a London home with a mountain on the roof.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Becky and David's Yurt - Simon and the team meet semi-retired couple Becky and David to help them convert their drab old yurt into an a colourful and inviting bijou B&B.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 3 - Stacey helps a family of five to reduce their record-breaking clothes collection, including 437 pairs of shoes!

programme.title: Billionaire Resorts S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Italy - Deep in the Italian mountains, we peek behind the scenes at Forestis - a hotel designed to help guests connect to nature, instead of the Wi-Fi.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast & Simple S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a speedy jarred-pepper pasta, crispy chicken in baked-bread sauce, and a beef brisket traybake - all prepped in minutes. He makes shelf-raid spiced haricot beans, and rounds it all off with a fast and simple strawberry & balsamic tart.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The finalists level up childhood favourites and cater for a celebrity party attended by Michael Dapaah and AJ Tracey with the help of the eliminated cooks.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep3

programme.title: Dead Of Night S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Kill Me Twice - A calculated serial killer preys on unsuspecting women. But when one woman refused to be his next victim, the killer goes on a tirade that ends his own demise.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Black Widow Lost Inca City And Genius Syndrome - Don Wildman untangles a deadly web of secrets in Florida, recalls an epic quest to find a city paved in gold, and investigates a life-changing accident.

programme.title: Eli Roth Presents: The Legion Of Exorcists S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Demonic Portal - The devil's minions find entry into our world through demonic portals. A distraught widow seeks help to cleanse her home of a demonic infestation.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Booze Is - Jack gets to live one of his greatest childhood dreams at Fenway Park,drinks a bizarre beaver-spiked liquor and learns what it takes to be a lobsterman.

programme.title: Off The Grid On The Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Over Population To Permanent Vacation - A Dallas business owner looks for a property in British Columbia, Canada, where he can escape the big city.

programme.title: Off The Grid On The Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Landlocked To Private Docks - An adventure-seeking couple looks to fulfill a lifelong dream of buying a vacation home on the beach in sunny Vanuatu.

programme.title: Dead Of Night S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Nothing To Hide - 21-year-old Nicole Hutchings doesnt return home from a Halloween party. Over time, secrets begin to emerge and lead investigators to the least likely of suspects.

programme.title: Eli Roth Presents: The Legion Of Exorcists S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Demonic Provocation - All is not what it seems when a pastor's son exhibits signs of possession. Plus, an exorcist's girlfriend becomes the victim of a demonic attack.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Eat, Sleep, Dance, Repeat!
programme.desc: Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep...you get the idea! These are your essential dance hits to get you through the day!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2016
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2016 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Top 20 Hip-Hop & R&B Hits!
programme.desc: MTV presents 20 of the biggest & smoothest Hip-Hop & R&B songs from recent years! Get ready to recite those bars and get your vocal chords ready for all the runs!

programme.title: MTV Live Vault!
programme.desc: We've headed down to the MTV Live Vault and discovered some amazing stuff. It's so good, we had to share it with you. This is the MTV Live Vault!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, R&B, K-Pop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: Gonzo With Jack Saunders
programme.desc: Legendary alternative music show Gonzo is back on MTV! Host Jack Saunders brings all the latest hot new alternative tunes, news and views!

programme.title: MTV Push Live 2020: Yungblud
programme.desc: Doncaster's finest export, Yungblud, shows just why he was crowned winner of MTV Push Ones To Watch 2020 as he brings his usual stage presence and charisma to Village Underground in East London.

programme.title: Willow Smith: I Want My MTV
programme.desc: Willow comes in to MTV HQ to talk about the music videos that made her a successful artist, and tells of the first video she ever saw on MTV and her biggest inspirations.

programme.title: MTV Blackpool Illuminations...
programme.desc: ...Switch On 2022: The Best Bits. Some of the biggest names in music light up the stage at the iconic Blackpool Tower ballroom as we count down to the switch on of the world famous illuminations!

programme.title: MTV's 50 Soundtrack Essentials

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep16
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 2 - As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep21
programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep22
programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 2 - Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep24
programme.desc: A Time To Skrill - When the Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless, the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep25
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 1 - When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep26

programme.title: Apa Kata Tetamu
programme.desc: Program mingguan terbitan BERNAMA TV ini merangkumkan temubual bersama tetamu yang bersiaran bersama Apa Khabar Malaysia. Informasi yang dipaparkan saban minggu menarik lagi bermanfaat buat penonton di saluran BERNAMA TV.

programme.title: Buletin Bernama
programme.desc: Berita semasa dalam dan luar negara yang mengandungi berita am, politik, ekonomi, niaga dan sukan.

programme.title: Sukan+ Close Up
programme.desc: Program Kapsul berdurasi 30 minit, mengupas secara lebih dekat perihal sukan secara menyeluruh melibatkan industri, kejohanan, program, prestasi, isu semasa dan kontroversi dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Bernama World
programme.desc: A comprehensive roundup of world news, covering a spectrum of events including political updates, economic trends, humanitarian efforts, environmental issues, and cultural highlights. Stay informed with diverse perspectives on the latest developments shaping our global landscape.

programme.title: Buletin Bernama
programme.desc: Berita semasa dalam dan luar negara yang mengandungi berita am, politik, ekonomi, niaga dan sukan.

programme.title: The Nation

programme.title: Darah Muda
programme.desc: Majalah bual bicara Darah Muda musim baharu mengangkat hal ehwal generasi baru merangkumi pencapaian dan inspirasi, cabaran dan dilema, minat dan gaya hidup serta isu-isu semasa dari perspektif belia.

programme.title: Bernama Global
programme.desc: Laporan berita antarabangsa terpilih yang disiarakan secara langsung setiap hari.

programme.title: The Nation
programme.desc: The Nation is a talkshow on the who's who and the everyday people. Everyone has a story, what's yours?

programme.title: ON e
programme.desc: "ON e" memaparkan perkembangan industri hiburan merangkumi industri muzik, filem, teater dan drama tempatan serta luar negara.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Bernama News
programme.desc: A news bulletin providing the best, accurate and timely news on current issues, community, crime, politics, sports, human interest, foreign, business and economics as well as sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Mandarin News
programme.desc: A news bulletin specially tailored for the Chinese community, providing daily news coverage on various topics involving politics, economics, culture and education. Follow-up and in-depth reports on issues concerning the Chinese society.

programme.title: Tamil News

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: HER Women in Asia
programme.desc: Adrenaline - In the sporting arena, women have become increasingly more visible, scoring Olympic medals, dominating international tournaments, and often becoming celebrities and role models. In recent years, many women athletes have spoken against the injustices they face in their personal and professional lives, such as racism, harassment and sexual assault. In this edition, HER meets three such athletes.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1103InternationalFighters
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts features explosive KOs from international fighters, showcasing stars from Russia, England, and South Africa like Dricus du Plessis, Paddy Pimblett, Ilia Topuria, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC314VolkanovskivsLopes
programme.desc: UFC 314 previews the promotions return to Miami, where former featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski squares off against Diego Lopes for the vacant featherweight crown. Plus, lightweights collide as Michael Chandler takes on Paddy Pimblett.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant UFC champions of all-time returns to the welterweight division on June 15 when Kamaru Usman faces off with rising star Joaquin Buckley in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The king of the 170-pounders for over three years, Usman has his sights set on regaining his title, but on the fast track to the top is Buckley, who brings a six-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Miranda Maverick hopes to punch her ticket into the world title conversation by turning back former champion Rose Namajunas in a pivotal co-main event showdown in the flyweight division.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep708
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Diego Lopes, Unbreakable: Ignacio Bahamondes, Ultimate Access: Alexa Grasso, Origins: Paul Rosas" - Brazilian featherweight Diego Lopes shares his journey from Brazil to Mexico. Inspired by Mexico's fighting spirit, Diego has made his home in the heart of Puebla, where his team proudly calls themselves the Brazilian Warriors. Ignacio Bahamondes details the story of his unbreakable bond with his father, a South American kickboxing champion, who played a crucial role in guiding him to the pinnacle of MMA. We go behind the scenes with Alexa Grasso as she returns to Mexico City to commentate at Moreno vs Royval 2. As the UFC's youngest fighter, Raul Rosas reflects on the sacrifices his immigrant family made to provide him with the opportunity to compete at the sport's highest level.

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1103InternationalFighters
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts features explosive KOs from international fighters, showcasing stars from Russia, England, and South Africa like Dricus du Plessis, Paddy Pimblett, Ilia Topuria, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC314VolkanovskivsLopes
programme.desc: UFC 314 previews the promotions return to Miami, where former featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski squares off against Diego Lopes for the vacant featherweight crown. Plus, lightweights collide as Michael Chandler takes on Paddy Pimblett.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant UFC champions of all-time returns to the welterweight division on June 15 when Kamaru Usman faces off with rising star Joaquin Buckley in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The king of the 170-pounders for over three years, Usman has his sights set on regaining his title, but on the fast track to the top is Buckley, who brings a six-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Miranda Maverick hopes to punch her ticket into the world title conversation by turning back former champion Rose Namajunas in a pivotal co-main event showdown in the flyweight division.
